sentence: The 50 companies in the S&P 500 that have hiked their dividends for at least 25 consecutive years.

See Also: 25 Dividend Stocks You Can Buy and Hold Forever

We've picked 12 reliable Aristocrat stocks with dividend-payment schedules that ensure investors will receive dividend checks every month of the year.

Consider:

Walmart Stores ( WMT ) Last Quarterly Dividend: 50 cents Also pays in: April, June, September

AT&T ( T ) Last Quarterly Dividend: 49 cents Also pays in: May, August, November

ExxonMobil ( XOM ) Last Quarterly Dividend: 75 cents Also pays in: June, September, December

Medtronic ( MDT ) Last Quarterly Dividend: 43 cents Also pays in: January, July, October

Procter & Gamble ( PG ) Last Quarterly Dividend: 66.95 cents Also pays in: February, August, November
